text: Wazirabad Junction railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Wazirabad city, Gujranwala district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Gujranwala District Category:Railway stations on Wazirabad–Narowal Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Khanewal–Wazirabad Line Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Wazirabad Junction railway station
